# Supplementary figure 1 (Cowplot)

```{r}

library(cowplot)

g <- plot_grid(supp_fig_1a_left,supp_fig_1a_right,ggplot() + theme_void(),sup_fig_1b,sup_fig_1c,ggplot() + theme_void(),rel_widths=c(1,1,0.8),nrow=2,ncol=3,
               labels=c('A','B','E','C','D','F'))
ggsave(file='Supplementary_figure_1_R.pdf', plot=g, width=8.5, height=5.0)

```
